rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
ECLS 不能提高急性心肌梗死并发心源性休克患者的生存率根据今天在 ESC 2023 年大会热线会议上公布的最新突破性研究，早期体外生命支持 (ECLS) 并不能提高计划进行早期血运重建的急性心肌梗死并发心源性休克患者的生存率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/ECLS-does-not-improve-survival-in-病人-with-acute-myocardial-infarction-complicated-by-cardiogenic-shock.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/ECLS-does-not-improve-survival-in-病人-with-acute-myocardial-infarction-complicated-by-cardiogenic-shock.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30d445e4-c0a7-4b5d-9664-9431331cdb3e Mon, 28 Aug 2023 15:43:06 -0400 ECLS does not improve survival in patients with acute myocardial infarction complicated by cardiogenic shock
脉冲场消融治疗阵发性心房颤动安全​​、有效根据今日 ESC 2023 年大会热线会议上公布的最新突破性研究，脉冲场消融 (PFA) 与传统热消融治疗阵发性心房颤动 (AF) 一样有效且安全。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Pulsed-field-ablation-safe- effective-for-the-treatment-of-paroxysmal-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Pulsed-field-ablation-safe- effective-for-the-treatment-of-paroxysmal-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e2b1247-4528-4b54-955c-be36d9a73ee5 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 14:57:47 -0400 Pulsed field ablation safe, effective for the treatment of paroxysmal atrial fibrillation
研究显示 OCT 引导经皮冠状动脉介入治疗策略的有效性和安全性根据今天在 ESC 2023 年大会热线会议上提出的最新突破性研究，光学相干断层扫描 (OCT) 在指导经皮冠状动脉介入治疗 (PCI) 方面不逊色于血管内超声 (IVUS)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Study-shows-efficacy-and-safety-of-OCT-guided-strategy-for-perderma-coronary-intervention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Study-shows-efficacy-and-safety-of-OCT-guided-strategy-for-perderma-coronary-intervention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0dd05de-edfe-4ede-9144-6294e4d5049b Mon, 28 Aug 2023 14:54:00 -0400 Study shows efficacy and safety of OCT-guided strategy for percutaneous coronary intervention
Acoramidis 有望成为治疗转甲状腺素蛋白淀粉样心肌病的有效、安全药物根据今日 ESC 2023 年大会热线会议上公布的最新研究结果，与安慰剂相比，Acoramidis 可以改善转甲状腺素蛋白淀粉样心肌病 (ATTR-CM) 患者的预后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Acoramidis-shows-pottial-to-be- effective-safe-treatment-for-transthyretin-amyloid-cardiomyopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Acoramidis-shows-pottial-to-be- effective-safe-treatment-for-transthyretin-amyloid-cardiomyopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=750f75f3-3968-499d-9dc9-df47cf8caefa Mon, 28 Aug 2023 14:38:44 -0400 Acoramidis shows potential to be effective, safe treatment for transthyretin amyloid cardiomyopathy
体弱老年房颤患者改用 NOAC 会增加出血风险对于患有房颤的体弱老年患者，将维生素 K 拮抗剂 (VKA) 治疗改为非维生素 K 拮抗剂口服抗凝剂 (NOAC) 与继续 VKA 治疗相比，会导致更多出血并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Switching-to-NOACs-in-frail-elderly-患者-with-atrial-fibrillation-increases-bleeding-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Switching-to-NOACs-in-frail-elderly-患者-with-atrial-fibrillation-increases-bleeding-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db489275-cafd-4fa9-85da-cc959e13b8cf Mon, 28 Aug 2023 14:32:48 -0400 Switching to NOACs in frail elderly patients with atrial fibrillation increases bleeding risk
血管内成像引导 PCI 与较低的目标病变失败率相关根据今天在 ESC 2023 年大会热线会议上发表的最新突破性研究，与血管造影引导的 PCI 相比，血管内成像引导的经皮冠状动脉介入治疗 (PCI) 的目标病变失败率较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Intraangio-imaging-guided-PCI-linked-with-lower-rate-of-target-lesion-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Intraangio-imaging-guided-PCI-linked-with-lower-rate-of-target-lesion-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da8123be-6300-4a52-a3f1-0af5e0c5a07a Mon, 28 Aug 2023 14:17:52 -0400 Intravascular imaging-guided PCI associated with lower rate of target lesion failure
研究显示，对于终末期心力衰竭患者，消融比药物治疗更有效根据今天在 ESC 热线会议上发表的最新突破性研究，与终末期心力衰竭患者的药物治疗相比，心房颤动消融可降低死亡率、紧急心脏移植或左心室辅助装置 (LVAD) 植入率2023 年国会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Ablation-more- effective-than-medical-therapy-in-患者-with-end-stage-heart-failure-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Ablation-more- effective-than-medical-therapy-in-患者-with-end-stage-heart-failure-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1874147-b11f-455f-92b4-76b67fc0525e Mon, 28 Aug 2023 14:05:11 -0400 Ablation more effective than medical therapy in patients with end-stage heart failure, study shows
机会较高或脆弱性较低的社区与儿童哮喘风险较低有关哈佛朝圣者卫生保健研究所的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，居住在早年机会较多或脆弱性较低的社区可能与儿童哮喘风险降低有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Neighborhoods-with-higher-opportunity-or-lower-vulnerability-linked-to-lower-risk-of-pediatric-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Neighborhoods-with-higher-opportunity-or-lower-vulnerability-linked-to-lower-risk-of-pediatric-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94badf2a-c585-43c7-a35a-70870a864c70 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 13:47:16 -0400 Neighborhoods with higher opportunity or lower vulnerability linked to lower risk of pediatric asthma
生理学引导的完全血运重建可减少老年心肌梗死患者的缺血事件根据今日在 ESC 2023 年大会热线会议上发表的最新研究成果，对于 75 岁或以上患有多支血管疾病的心肌 (MI) 梗死患者，生理学引导的完全血运重建与单纯血运重建相比，可减少缺血事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Physiology-guided-complete-reangioization-reduces-ischemic-events-in-older-MI-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Physiology-guided-complete-reangioization-reduces-ischemic-events-in-older-MI-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8e2a969-df8b-4d16-87d3-868d9e3a5ed7 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 13:20:39 -0400 Physiology-guided complete revascularization reduces ischemic events in older MI patients
ARREST 试验结果问题需要将所有心脏骤停患者运送到中心一项涉及英国伦敦所有医院的随机试验发现，被救护车送往心脏骤停中心的社区心脏骤停复苏患者与被送往地理位置最近的急诊室的患者相比，30 天生存率没有差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/ARREST-trial-results-question-need-to-transport-all-cardiac-arrest-病人-to-centers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/ARREST-trial-results-question-need-to-transport-all-cardiac-arrest-病人-to-centers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bac03622-42dd-478a-93a1-bcfcc13684fa Mon, 28 Aug 2023 13:07:44 -0400 ARREST trial results question need to transport all cardiac arrest patients to centers
